Hi all.  I'm still working with heritrix-1.14.1.  I'm already ALMOST up to =
beginner status!  At this time, I'm having problems when a crawl job hits i=
ts max-document-download limit.  Given a reasonably hefty download limit, h=
eritrix generates several arc.gz files - but the process usually leaves one=
 final arc.gz.open file.  For me, this has prevented recovery of the last .=
arc file for processing by bin/arcreader, which demands its input in a .arc=
 file.  Does anybody know if its possible to persuade heritrix to close a s=
till-open archive file on exit?  Does anybody know how?

Any suggestions wo=
uld be welcome.

-Rich B.
